Sequence Information.Peptide Name: IG-25 (LL-37(13-37), synthetic AMPs20; C-terminal fragment of LL-37, UCLL1a)
Sequence Information.Source: Sequence truncation, human cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Peptide design: Artificially generated C-terminal fragment of LL-37.Activity: Active against E. coli and S. aureus.Surface immobilized peptide: IG-25 has also been  immobilized to fluorous thin films (dip-coated) followed by covalnetly coupling to fluorosilicone contact lens (covalently) surfaces. The surface is active against Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1 (Santos et al., 2013).Updated 6/2018; 11/2023.
Literature Information.Author: Li X, Li Y, Han H, Miller DW, Wang G.
Literature Information.Title: Solution structures of human LL-37 fragments and NMR-based identification of a minimal membrane-targeting antimicrobial and anticancer region
